name: 楊重光
objective: 反應工程是在商業規模之考慮下對化學反應開發利用之相關工程活動。其目的在成功的設計和操作化學反應器，並使化學工程在工程專業中成為一個獨特的支系。此高等反應工程是延續大學部己學習在均相中有關之簡單觀念及理論，並推展到非均相較複雜系統之設計及操作上。學生在修習此課後，對於較複雜之反應器有清晰及整體之概念。
schedule:
1st -4th  weeks review of basic concepts in chemical reaction engineering (chapter 1 to chapter 6)
5th -8th weeks, nonisothermal reactor design
9th - 12th weeks, catalysis and catalytic reactors
13th - 15th weeks, external diffusion effects on hetegenerous reactions
16th - 17th weeks, diffusion and reaction in porous catalysts
scorePolicy:
Midterm examination
Final examination
Quiz
Attendance
materials: Elements of chemical reaction engineering, H. S. Fogler
